item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

item.content:encoded:

Brand ‎SJOYBRING

Product Dimensions ‎7.01 x 3.23 x 3.94 inches
Country of Origin ‎China

Manufacturer Part Number ‎JOY-M005

Best Sellers Rank #7,803 in Electronics (See Top 100 in Electronics)
#28 in Car Audio Receivers
Date First Available November 3, 2019

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $119.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:48:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

SjoyBring M005 7 Inch Double Din Car Stereo

M005 Double Din Car Stereo features with a 7-inch capacitive touch screen, a user-friendly interface and modern functions design for your comfort and entertainment during driving trip.

From listening to FM AM Radio, casting the map navigating from your phone to big screen, keeping your passengers enjoy a movie in the trip, taking Bluetooth hands-free phone calls and even parking your car safely and fast, M005 car stereo will be your best driving partner!

Easy DIY installation, compatible with most car models7 inch HD LCD monitor, With Resolution 1024*600Compatible with Android and IOS phones for Mirror-LinkSupports Front/rear view camera video Input and Video outputBluetooth hands-free calling and audio streamIncludes rear camera, wireless remoteUSB for fast phone charging Built-in 16-band EQ settingsStylish 7 color Led buttonsSupports Steering Wheel ControlPre-amp & subwoofer outputsWorking Voltage: DC 12V; Max power output: 4x 60watt

Safer Parking

Our reversing rear camera adopts BMW interface, can make the connection more secure, more stable, simpler, much better than similar products.

Easy operation and wiring, easy operation and help driver a safe and easier parking.

Package includes an HD rear camera with night vision, a 170° ultra-wide viewing angle and a full waterproof design. The JOY-M005 was designed having your safety and comfort in mind, supporting rear and front view camera with an automatic display of image when in reverse.

Mirror Link for Android & IOS

Compatible with Android phones and IOS phones (No version limit). The function allows you to cast what’s displayed on your phone to the car stereo screen via original USB interface, easily realize map navigation, watch movies, etc.

Please Note:

1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function.

2. Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.

Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-clear MIC

With the updated Bluetooth 5.2, which is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, you can take and make calls in seconds by pairing it with your smartphone. Listen to your favorite music services and apps with the wireless Bluetooth audio stream, control tracks, volume and play / pause with a simple touch of a button.

Ultra-clear built-in microphone, hassle-free noise when making a phone call, so you can make a phone call easily while focusing on the road.

Full HD Capacitive Touchscreen

During driving, your family and friends can watch the TV show or movies with this multifunctional car radio which features a highly sensitive TFT HD capacitive touchscreen.

7 inch HD LCD capacitive monitor with resolution 1024 X 600, supports 1920 X 1080P and most video / audio file formats. Keep kids busy watching cartoons during long rides, watch your favorite TV show or movie with this MP5 player.

FM/AM Radio & Memory Function

FM: 87.5 MHz -107.9 MHz and AM: 52 KHz -1620 KHz radio frequency enables you to receive signal messages more reliably. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.

With this car radio you can enjoy stable reception, clear sound and a switchable tuner function even on the highway or in bad weather. Listen to your favorite radio shows in Europe, the USA and South America.

Steering Wheel Control

You can use the vehicle’s steering wheel buttons to answer and end calls, play music, switch modes and much more, all of which make your journey more comfortable.

Simply connect the SWC cable of your vehicle to the key1 or key2 cable of this device. Follow the instructions to learn the keys.

Note: If the SWC is a digital signal output (controlled by CANBUS), you will need to buy an SWC adapter that can convert digital signals to analog signals.

16-Band EQ Audio Setting

The car audio system- high sound quality experience for you

With a built-in preset EQ and user customized 16-band EQ options, this multimedia system is ideal for a wide variety of music styles and sound effects. Crystal clear sound and easily adjustable volume for the complete experience.

Subwoofer Output

Pre-Amp and Subwoofer outputs allow you to expand your system by adding up to 2 amps and/or signal processors. Easily enhance your sound from your speakers and make sure no sound distortion at the maximum volume.

Subwoofer Output make it possible to provide seamless and smooth sound characteristics with dynamic, high impact bass that lets you hear and feel the music.

Stylish LED Buttons & Physical Buttons

7 colors that change automatically with the possibility of setting a unique one of your choice and a stylish design for the LED buttons of this multimedia system!

Physical buttons, especially the rotating volume control that makes it easier to use while driving.

Important tips before ordering

1. JOY-M005 is standard size fits most brands of car models, but it’s also recommended to make sure if your dash board opening size is one of the following three sizes (No matter amazonconfirmedfit shows your vehicle model fits or not), if yes, our stereo can match your car perfectly:

Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173*98mm(6.81*3.86inch)- standard size commonly used by some Ford, Lincoln, and Chevrolet. (Note: not include all, some car models are of special size, need to purchase frame installation)Commonly used Double Din sizes for car series in the Asian: 178*100mm(7*4inch)-standard size commonly used by some of Nissan, Hyundai, KIA and Honda. (Note: not include all , some car models are special size, need to purchase frame installation)Other common sizes: 190*116mm(7.48*4.57inch)

2. If your DASH BOARD opening size is not the above three, then you need to buy a double din DASH KIT that fits your car model.

The brand installation DOUBLE DIN DASH KIT opening size is 173(W)×98MM(H) (Metra, PAC, Scosche, etc.) that can match with our stereo perfectly or modify your dashboard when you install the stereo.

3. Some cars may also require two additional accessories to complete the installation:

Wire harness adapter for your car model. ( Used to transfer your factory harness and ISO stereo wiring harness)Radio antenna adapter for your car model.

4. The head unit has a memory function. If the ACC wire (red wire) and the B+ wire (yellow wire) are connected reversely during the installation, the product will have no memory function after the power is off.

5. The working voltage of this car stereo is 12V, it can’t be used for large trucks with 24V, and the car stereo will be damaged when the voltage is over 16V.

6. This car stereo does Not CarPlay or android auto function.

【Bluetooth 5.2 & Ultra-Clear MIC】The upgraded Bluetooth 5.2 is more stable, faster, smoother and clearer, enables wireless streaming of music, calls, MP3 players and more. The built-in ultra-clear microphone realize clearer calls and more accurate voice control, never distract you from driving, ensure safer driving.
【Mirror Link for Android and iOS Phones】 The double din car stereo supports IOS & Android phone (no version limit) for mirror link function, mirror the screen of your smartphone and show Google Maps, Spotify, Youtube etc. in the car radio. Replacing the cell phone with a car screen to realize vehicle intelligence. (Please Note: 1. This is MirrorLink function, not Carplay function. 2.Mirrorlink for IOS phones doesn’t support Apps operation on screen.)
【Free reversing camera】The car radio supports the rear and front view and will display the image automatically when the vehicle shifts into reverse. HD night vision rear view camera is included, ultra-wide viewing angle of 170 ° and a fully waterproof design, helps to park more safely and easily.
【7 Inch Full Touch HD Capacitive Screen】 Functions with 1024 X 600 resolution 7 inch HD touch screen, support 1920 X 1080P video playback. High resolution screen quality, full capacitive touch screen for more sensitive and accurate operation. Physical buttons make it easier to use while driving, especially the rotating volume control.
【FM/AM Radio with Memory Function】 With FM radio that transmission power range is wider, signal coverage is wider, and more stations can be received, your journey is no longer boring. The memory function remembers radio stations in an intelligent way.
【Important Tips】1. Please make sure if your dash board opening size fits our car stereo. If you find that our stereo size does not meet your dash size, please purchase a suitable dash kit. 2.Please read the instructions before installation and it is recommended to install at a professional car audio shop. 3. Some cars may also require two additional after accessories to complete the installation: Wire harness adapter and radio antenna adapter for your car model.
【Check Dash Board Size Fits】 No matter the garage search shows your vehicle model fits our car stereo or not, please read our stereo size carefully and measure your dashboard size, if the dimensions match one of the following three sizes, then our stereo will fit your model: ①Commonly used sizes for car series in the U.S. and Europe: 173×98mm(6.81×3.85inch); ②Commonly used sizes for car series in the Asian: 178×100mm(7×4inch); ③Other common sizes:190×116mm(7.48×4.56inch).
Ideal gift for special day like birthday, Father’s Day or Christmas, Thanksgiving Day.

item.title: Fagomfer Kwumsy D1 PRO Real-time Ambient TV LED Backlight Kit with HDMI 2.0 Sync Box, Immersion Ambient Lighting Strips for 75-90 Inch TV, 15 Lighting Modes/4 HDMI Inputs/Handy Remote Control
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

Price: $209.00

Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click “Add A Device” , then find “P42B” to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or”OK” in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings → Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Don’t missing any notifications

After connecting the watch with your phone, you can get calls, receive SMS and APP messages (Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter…), calendar, weather and other smartphone app alerts, and you won’t miss any important information.

Ai Voice

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modes： Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

【2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch】Wwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. Our bluetooth smartwatch come with fashionable appearance and comfortable silicone bracelet, fit your wrist well and more nicer and safety , easy to wear and take off, and you can adjust the length of the band. It is a ideal choice as a gift for men and womenin 2022.
【1.7 inch Full Touch Screen & Customize Personalized Dial】High texture metal watch frame with 1.7-inch HD full touch screen and excellent image quality design brings you a better user experience. And our smartwatch has more than 150+ different watch faces, you can choose different dials from APP’s market according to festival, your mood or clothes. And you can also customize your watch faces with your personal photos, new look for everyday.
【Push Real-time Information to Your Wrist】The smart watch with bluetooth call can connect to iOS8.0 and Android4.4 phone via Bluetooth 4.0, and you can answer or dial calls anywhere, and get calendar, weather and SNS (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Twitter,etc.) notifications on display. It will be very practical when you are unconvenient to take your phone out or you don’t want to miss anything important.
【Multifunctional Health Tracking】This fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
【IP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models】Our health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.

Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected home devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: The mini plug is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

Price: $29.99 - $17.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:55 UTC – Details)


It started in 2015 with a very smart plug. But, before that very smart plug, Kasa Smart was TP-Link Research America – TP-Link’s think tank for all things smart home. Building our name in the land of innovation, known as Silicon Valley, we were tasked with doing a deep dive into the smart home market to create customer-centric, reliable and quality products.
Smart in wall outlets: Kasa smart’s in wall outlet lets you control 2 plugged in devices from anywhere at the same time or individually; All the features and benefits of a Kasa smart plug multiplied; Take up less space with this in wall option that’s ideal for Your living room, kitchen, even your bedroom
Control from anywhere: Turn your in wall outlet on or off, set schedules or scenes from anywhere with your smartphone using the Kasa smart app; Remotely turn your holiday lights on while you’re at the office or away from home
Voice control: Use simple voice commands with you in wall smart outlet and any Alexa or Google Assistant. You can give each outlet a unique name and use them separately; Ask Alexa to turn your bedroom lamps off when it’s bedtime, so you don’t have to get up and do it yourself
Grouping: In the Kasa Smart app you can combine devices together for unified control with one single tap on your smartphone; Combine living room bulbs, plugs and switches together for more convenient access
Away mode: Improve your home’s security by setting your outlet to turn connected devices on and off randomly throughout the day to make it appear you’re home even while you’re away. Operating temperature-32°F-104°F (0ºC-40ºC). Operating humidity-10%-90%RH, non-condensing

Read more

Sleek design controllable from anywhere

Everything you enjoy about smart plugs, now in a sleek, in-wall outlet. Save space and create a natural smart home environment by installing the Kasa Smart WiFi Power Outlet, 2-Sockets in your bedroom, living room, garage and other areas. Individually control up to two connected devices using your smartphone or favorite voice assistant.

  • Individually control each outlet
  • Easy installation (In-wall electrical wiring required)
  • Tamper resistant
  • No hub required
  • Set schedules and timers
  • Away mode for improved security
  • Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
  • ETL certified (Control number 5010780, by Intertek Testing Services NA Inc., 2019)

Requirements

  • Mobile device running Android 4.4 or higher or iOS 10.0 or higher
  • Secured 2.4GHz home WiFi Network
  • Standard outlet wall box (at least 2 inches deep)
  • Neutral wire required
  • Kasa Smart app and associated Kasa Smart account

Read more

Control from Anywhere

Turn your in-wall outlet on or off, set schedules or scenes from anywhere with your smartphone using the Kasa Smart app. Remotely turn on connected devices while you’re at the office or away from home. Or use the manual on/off button for hands on control.

Set Schedules and Timers

Use the Kasa Smart app to individually schedule each device connected to the Kasa Smart in-wall outlet to turn on and off at set times. Even set a timer for each device so it turns off after a certain amount of minutes.

Voice Control

Use simple voice commands with your in-wall smart outlet and Alexa or Google Assistant. You can give each outlet a unique name and use them separately. Ask Alexa to turn your bedroom lamps off when it’s bedtime, so you don’t have to get up and do it yourself.

Away Mode

Improve your home’s security by setting your outlet to turn connected devices on and off randomly throughout the day to make it appear you’re home even while you’re away.

Read more

Safety is a Priority

ETL certified to provide peace of mind that quality and safety are standards we strive for.

(Control number 5010780, by Intertek Testing Services NA Inc., 2019)

Group Your Smart Devices

Use the Grouping feature on the Kasa Smart app to combine your devices together for unified control with one single tap on your smartphone. Combine your smart lights, plugs, and outlets together for an easier way to turn them on when you get home.

No Hub Required

The Kasa Smart WiFi Power Outlet works with a secured 2.4GHz wireless network without the need for a separate hub. All you need is your smartphone, the Kasa Smart app and a WiFi connection to start controlling your in-wall outlet from anywhere.

Easy Installation

Be up and running with your new smart outlet in as little as 15 minutes! The Kasa Smart app provides a step-by-step guide for easy installation. Also find our short installation video on kasasmart.com.

  • Note: Easily replace non-GFCI outlets in a Kitchen and/or Bathroom provided a GFCI outlet is already installed on the same line.

Read more

Read more
